hero.title: Ranks & Progression
hero.description: An overview of how roles, responsibility, and trust grow within the Mōchirīī guild.
hero.pill: Growth, contribution, and harmony guide advancement.

ladder.title: The Path of Progression
ladder.description: Each rank reflects experience, responsibility, and contribution to the guild.
ladder.caption: Progression is earned through consistency, cooperation, and care for the community rather than competition.

senior.title: Senior Leadership
senior.description: Those entrusted with direction, long-term vision, and stewardship of the guild.
senior.note: Members may approach this tier for major decisions, guidance, or conflict resolution.

ranks.name: Guild Leader
ranks.description: Holds final responsibility for guild direction, culture, and long-term goals.

ranks.name: Vice Leader
ranks.description: Supports leadership operations and ensures continuity across activities.

ranks.name: Hall Leader
ranks.description: Oversees specific halls or groups, guiding members and maintaining order.

middle.title: Middle Leadership
middle.description: Veteran members who safeguard community culture and provide day-to-day guidance.
middle.note: This tier supports both leadership and newer members, helping maintain balance.

ranks.name: Dharmapala
ranks.description: Protects guild values, fairness, and respectful conduct.

ranks.name: Lotus Warden
ranks.description: Provides stability, guidance, and assistance to members in need.

ranks.name: Petal Keeper
ranks.description: Supports daily activity, community engagement, and guild harmony.

members.title: Members
members.description: The heart of the guild, where growth, learning, and camaraderie begin.
members.note: Advancement is based on participation, kindness, and steady involvement.

ranks.name: Mochi Blossom
ranks.description: An active and dependable member contributing positively to the guild.

ranks.name: Young Bamboo
ranks.description: A growing member learning systems, culture, and teamwork.

ranks.name: Softwind
ranks.description: A new arrival becoming familiar with the guild and its rhythm.

ranks.name: Rice Sprout
ranks.description: A freshly joined member beginning their journey in Mōchirīī.

footer.text: Ranks are not a measure of worth, but a reflection of trust, time, and contribution within the guild.
